description:
Effective communication skills are essential in the 21st century.

Getting your ideas across successfully requires an understanding of communication styles and behavioural flexibility.

In this course, you will learn how to:

  • Communicate effectively using simple and concise language
  • Enhance listening skills to anticipate and avoid misunderstandings
  • Foster cross-cultural understanding in your workplace...and you will:
  • Demonstrate that you have begun to fine-tune your perceptions of others' unconscious communications and to extend the range of your responses.
  • Demonstrate your ability to build and maintain rapport with others through various ways, including behaviour and specific language patterns.

So, do you want to improve your skills in public speaking, giving presentations, presenting yourself assertively or taking part in meetings?

Then don't wait, join us today!
title: Effective Communication Skills - Career Training
